select_spread.text: Select a spread type to begin your mystical journey

spread_selected.text: You've selected the {spreadName}. Click "Begin Reading" to start your journey into the cards' wisdom.

draw_cards.text: {remaining} more card{plural} to draw. Click the deck to continue your reading.

reading_complete.text: Your reading is complete! Explore the detailed meanings by clicking on individual cards, or use the analysis tools for deeper insights.

draw_mode_start.text: Draw {cardCount} card{plural} for your {spreadName} reading. Click the deck to draw your first card.

saved_reading_loaded.text: Saved reading loaded. Click on cards for detailed meanings or use the analysis tools.

analysis_error.text: Error analyzing reading. Please try again.

mode_draw_desc.text: Let fate guide your reading by randomly drawing cards from the deck

mode_manual_desc.text: Choose specific cards from the deck for your reading

no_readings.text: No saved readings yet. Complete a reading and save it to see it here.

confirm_delete.text: Are you sure you want to delete this reading?

analysis.text: The numerical frequency suggests {frequency_meaning}. With a total sum of {sum}, the reading vibrates at {vibration_meaning}.

major_arcana_dominant.text: a powerful spiritual awakening and major life themes demanding attention. The universe is actively guiding you through significant transformations.

major_arcana_none.text: a focus on practical, day-to-day matters and personal development within your current life circumstances.

major_arcana_balanced.text: a balanced blend of spiritual guidance and practical considerations, suggesting both inner work and outer action are needed.

reversed_dominant.text: The predominance of reversed cards indicates a time of internal processing, reflection, and shadow work.

elemental_fire.text: Your path forward requires courage, creativity, and bold action.

elemental_water.text: Trust your intuition and allow emotions to guide you toward healing.

elemental_air.text: Mental clarity and honest communication will illuminate your way.

elemental_earth.text: Focus on practical steps and building solid foundations for lasting success.

conclusion.text: This reading encourages you to integrate all aspects of your experience—spiritual, emotional, mental, and physical—for holistic growth and authentic self-expression.

wands.text: Take bold action on your creative projects and trust your passionate impulses.

cups.text: Honor your emotional needs and create space for intuitive reflection.

swords.text: Engage in meaningful conversations and seek new learning opportunities.

pentacles.text: Focus on practical steps, financial planning, and physical wellness.

reversed.text: Practice patience and self-reflection before taking major external actions.

major_arcana.text: Pay attention to synchronicities and spiritual signs guiding your path.

default1.text: Trust the process and remain open to unexpected opportunities.

default2.text: Balance action with reflection for optimal results.

major_arcana1.text: What major life lesson is the universe trying to teach me right now?

major_arcana2.text: How can I align more closely with my soul's purpose?

wands1.text: What creative project or passion deserves more of my energy?

wands2.text: Where in my life do I need to take more initiative?

cups1.text: What emotions am I avoiding that need to be felt and healed?

cups2.text: How can I nurture my relationships and emotional well-being?

swords1.text: What mental patterns or beliefs need to be examined and possibly released?

swords2.text: Where do I need more clarity or honest communication in my life?

pentacles1.text: How can I better manifest my goals in the physical world?

pentacles2.text: What practical steps will move me toward greater security and abundance?

shadow1.text: What hidden aspects of myself are seeking integration and acceptance?

shadow2.text: How might current challenges be gifts in disguise?

default1.text: What is my highest priority for personal growth right now?

default2.text: How can I trust my inner wisdom more fully?

default3.text: What would love do in this situation?

energetic_influence_major.text: carrying universal archetypal power that operates beyond personal will.

energetic_influence_wands.text: igniting passion and creative fire within your spirit

energetic_influence_cups.text: opening emotional depths and enhancing intuitive receptivity

energetic_influence_swords.text: sharpening mental clarity and cutting through illusion

energetic_influence_pentacles.text: grounding aspirations into tangible, practical reality

energetic_influence_reversed.text: The reversed orientation suggests this energy is internalized, blocked, or in transition.

reversed_significance.text: The reversed orientation of {cardName} indicates that its energy is operating internally, suggesting a need for inner work, patience, or a different approach than the upright meaning would suggest. This may represent blocked energy, shadow work, or a period of gestation before external manifestation.
